ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
$=JSON.parse(result);
list=[];
if($.Success){
vol=$.Volumes;
for(i in vol){
   //卷
     list.push({
            Chapter_name:'📖 '+vol[i].Volume_name+' 📖',
            Chapter_id  :vol[i].Volume_id
           })
   //章节
     for(j in vol[i].Chapters){
           c=vol[i].Chapters[j];
          list.push({
             Chapter_name:c.Chapter_name,
            Chapter_id:c.Chapter_id
          })
      }
}
}else{l=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(java.get('url'))).select('.chapter').toArray();
for(i in l){
list.push({Chapter_name:String(l[i].text()),Chapter_id:String(l[i].select('a').attr('href')).match(/\d+\/(.*?)\.html$/)[1]})
}list.push({Chapter_name:'登录后查看完整卷/章节列表'})
}
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>
